name: Simple Service
description: Reeanna, a young woman in Trinidad who lives a humble life of devotion to the Lord and service to others. She endured depression and lack of purpose before salvation. Now she is filled with the purpose of sharing the hope that transformed her life. She serves as the right-hand woman to Lennox Boodram and the spiritual mother to the rehabilitation participants at Turning Point Ministries.
author: Hannah Dunlap
